factions.name: Royal Court of Castile
factions.description: The inner circle loyal to Juan II. Now includes a secret advisory cabinet (Daza, Sandoval, Barrientos, Mendoza, Manrique) plus core court figures. Álvaro de Luna administers the kingdom during Juan's pilgrimage, protected by a unanimous-consent regency council.

factions.name: Faction of the Infantes de Aragón
factions.description: Coalition of the Infantes de Aragón and allied nobles. Their revolt during Juan's absence failed — only seized Arévalo and two minor castles, won ~12% noble support. Master of Santiago (Luis de Guzmán) is their most important military ally. Must now negotiate from weakness at the November Royal Council.
